name: Think
description: An action of **reflecting** on past experiences, **planning** for the future, or **deeply contemplating** the current situation.

parameters.name: think_scope
parameters.description: Scope of contemplation (past_reflection: reflecting on past, future_planning: planning future, current_analysis: analyzing present)

parameters.name: topic
parameters.description: Specific topic or matter of interest to think about

requirements: A quiet and undisturbed environment is preferred
whenToUse: When you want to think **carefully** before making **important decisions**
When you want to **reflect** on **past experiences** and learn lessons
When you want to think specifically about **future plans** or goals
When you want to organize **current emotions** or situations
When you want to find answers to **complex problems**
When you want to listen to your **inner voice** during quiet time
